title: Blue Ridge Parkway: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Guest Speakers The Blue Ridge Parkway's own rangers serve as guest speakers in the classroom. The staff offers programs for students in their classrooms through the fall and winter. The rangers conducting these programs have years of experience with children of a variety of ages. They know the state curriculum and will work with the teacher in our "Parks As Classrooms" program.  All Guest Speakers     Curriculum Materials Driving through time: The digital Blue Ridge Parkway These lessons offer teachers and students the opportunity to delve into the rich primary sources and historical overlooks from the Driving Through Time project and explore the history of the Blue Ridge Parkway.  All Curriculum Materials
